name: In Charge of Power
body:
**A new city has been built! But who turned off the lights?**

![2017-07-31 02_56_16-Greenshot (Custom) (2).png](ludum-dare/39/in-charge-of-power/images/5e1a.png)

*In Charge of Power* is a game in which you are responsible for providing electricity for a recently founded city. As the city gains more citizens, the need for electricity grows steadily. Will you be able to provide for the city, or will you run out of power and become a disappointment? See if you can help the city grow to a population of **one hundred citizens**!

![2017-07-31 02_56_57-Greenshot (Custom) (2).png](ludum-dare/39/in-charge-of-power/images/5e1b.png)

*How to play*
1. Use your mouse to hover over things and perhaps click some of those things.
2. The game should be able to tell you which things are worth clicking.
3. For adventurous folks the game also reacts to scrolling of the wheel and panning of the screen.

![2017-07-31 02_57_28-Greenshot (Custom) (2).png](ludum-dare/39/in-charge-of-power/images/5e26.png)

*I have only tested the Windows build with these resolutions: 1280x720, 1920x1080, 2560x1440.*

![2017-07-31 02_57_04-Greenshot (Custom) (2).png](ludum-dare/39/in-charge-of-power/images/5e24.png)

comments.body:
I think the game could do with a bit of balancing because I found it hard to get over about 20 citizens, but the game is good otherwise. 
It might be worth adding some more ways to get money, or increasing the amount of coal a processing plant produces so it can provide for 2 coal plants.
The music is well made, the concept is interesting, and it's fun to replay.

comments.body: I've always been a fan of Sim City like games so you get bonus points from me! Love the music as well, and gave the game multiple attempts. It seems to get really hard when you have 20 or so citizens.

event.name: Ludum Dare 39
event.body:
Join us for our **39th** major Ludum Dare event. Our 2nd event running on the brand new software!

Again we're sticking to a classic Ludum Dare, with a **72 hour Jam** and **48 hour Compo**. There may be some minor tweaks to the rules for improved clarity.

Follow the **[/news](/news)** for the latest updates on the event.

* :green_book: **Game Hosting Guide:** [/ludum-dare/hosting-guide](/events/ludum-dare/hosting-guide)
* :earth_americas: **Real World Gatherings:** [List of Real World Gatherings (thread)](/events/ludum-dare/39/$32803/real-world-gatherings-for-ludum-dare-39)
